Method.name: translate
Method.Implementation:
#dim lastName As %String set lastName = ##class(ActionMenuUtil).getLastNameMenu( name )
set DisplayName = $case(lastName, "%TestUnitarioContext" : "Testar", ; Do not move, context menu. "%TestUnitario" : "Testar", ; Do not move, main menu. "%TestClass" : "Testar classe", "%TestAndCompile" : "Compilar e Testar classe", "%TestAllClass" : "Testar Suíte Completo", "%TestPackage" : "Testar Pacote", "%TestLastTest" : "Testar o último testado", "%TestClearResult" : "Limpar cache de resultados", "%TestClearPopulate" : "Limpar Populate", "%TestAutomaticOff" : "Desligar auto Teste", "%TestAutomaticOn" : "Ligar auto Teste", :DisplayName)
quit $$$OK
